Safety: Problem: RESOURCE NEEDS Goal: Patient/family/caregiver will have coordination between medical team and current CPS providers to support care needs Outcome: Ongoing Flowsheets (Taken 11/23/2022 1219) Resource Needs - Intervention - Coordinate between medical team & CPS providers: Engage current CPS providers in care planning and establishing safe plans for transition home Progress: LSW and CYS communicated via email regarding discharge and insurance related questions. LSW looped CLD CM in on email to support with CYS questions. CYS informed that if patient is transferred from CHOP to another hospital, patient will need to have the state address in order to apply for government insurance in said state.
